title: tech question about pixel 5
content: I understand that 5G sucks a lot more battery than 4G.  I understand that some phones turn off the 5G system when there is no 5G signal to preserve battery.  Does the Pixel 5 turn off the 5G system when there is no signal?  What about when there is a 5G signal but your calling plan does not include use of it by your Pixel 5?
